code: import React from"react";import Title from"./Title";import{tours}from"./data";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Tours=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"section",id:"tours",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Title,{title:"featured",spanTitle:"tours"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"section-center featured-center",children:tours.map(tour=>{const{id,image,title,date,info,location,Duration,price}=tour;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("article",{className:"tour-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"tour-img-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:image,className:"tour-img",alt:""}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"tour-date",children:date})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"tour-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"tour-title",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:title})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:info}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"tour-footer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-map"})})," ",location]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:Duration}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["from $",price]})]})]})]},id);})})]});};export default Tours;
